short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for in-page quick wikipedia searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A in-page Wikipedia extension. The extension allows for in-page Wikipedia Searches. Simply double click on a word and the extension will open up a summary from Wikipedia.
